website_summaries.verdict: A decently priced beginner drum set with a few minor flaws.
cons: Suited for children and younger teens but not adults
Materials and hardware are somewhat flimsy

customer_reviews.title: She has a smaller bedroom and it fits in there great. Great starter set for a young kid who ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12y/o daughter who interested in the drums. She has a smaller bedroom and it fits in there great. Great starter set for a young kid who is interested. It is a smaller set, but my hiusband who is 5'11" can sit down and play it. It is definitly not a professional set, but will help your kid practice or decide that they really don't want to play the drums, and you didn't waste a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: az lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: We love this set. I looked at lots of reviews. This set was easy to assemble. Has a great "real drum" sound. She had so much fun playing all the different drums and symbols. Definitely not a toy. The symbols have a little bit of a thin sound. If the sound of the symbols is important to you then you need to get a more expensive set. This set was perfect for our family.
customer_reviews.author: MamaHippo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds good. Nice set overall!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice little drum set and I'm very happy with it overall. It wasn't too bad to put together in the instructions were pretty clear although I have no idea how to tune a drum set. It looks really nice and has held up while over the past year even though my four-year-old beats on it constantly. It is a little bit on the small side and I probably wouldn't recommend it for anyone older than seven or eight but for anyone younger than that age I would highly recommend it. Seems to sound pretty good and I've had no issues. Overall I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NJM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit for a kid!! Sounds good too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little kit for my nephew. It came earlier than expected, all parts were there and functioning very well. Took me about a half hour to set it all up. PERFECT FIRST KIT FOR MY 7 YEAR OLD NEPHEW! Real shells, real heads, real cymbals. Everything might be a little cheap but it's a great starter kit for a kid. 4 stars just because some of the hardware designs could be better.... but then again, I can be a picky bastard sometimes...
customer_reviews.author: Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for first time drums & actually seeing if your ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for first time drums & actually seeing if your child will actually take a liking to it ... well he did & he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Brandice

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, horrible set up instructions.  Use youtube... there is a vid up that can make it much easier.
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else... I got this for my kids. They love it. it was a little tough to set up... instructions? I eventually looked up "5 piece drum kit small" and saw a video that was made by a different manufacture but the kit was exactly the same. Easy to follow the step by step instructions.. This kit sounds pretty good for it being this small; we actually play along with a guitar and bass and the sound cuts through pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Stowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for all types of players
customer_reviews.text: Beyond a JR. set. I was pleasantly surprised by this kit and highly recommend it. The set arrived on time with no damage. It came in one small box ans was surprised on how this kit was pacjed in such a small box. I bought this for my wife who is a beginner but as a seasoned player I was surprised on how good the set sounded.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This set is not a good value. It sounds terrible and it's just a fust collector. I had a friend who is a drummer try to adjust everything but it's garbage. If you want an expensive banging toy for a toddler then by all means get it. You can not seriously attempt to use this. My son will be going to a friend's house for drums and I'm out of money I shouldn't have even spent on this garbage. I should have spent the extra at a local shop. Lesson learned? (Pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: GDmom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was our son’s big Christmas present this year. We assembled it last night (Christmas Eve) and the directions are incredibly lacking and there was a lot of guesswork on our part. The clip on kick drum pedal fell apart (there’s 2 tiny screw things holding it on that it won’t stay in) and our son was crazy happy when he woke up and saw the drums but he’s had to stop playing 4 times in the 3 hours we’ve been awake for me to try to put the pedal back together again. I won’t say it’s ruined Christmas because that’s harsh but for $180 I expected better quality and something my kid can actually play.
customer_reviews.author: MGJL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Quality. Incredible Value.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. This is a legit drum kit. Perfect for a beginner but gives them a real experience with sound, set up and quality. With such a low price I was skeptical but when they arrived I couldn’t believe it! It wasn’t a toy or a poor attempt of an instrument. They are even made out of quality wood like expensive full size drum sets. Being a former drummer myself my expectations were low with this set. I can’t say enough how impressed I am with these. My son is 7 and it fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Legacy

customer_reviews.title: These were a lot better quality then I had expected
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot better quality then I had expected. Built heavy just light better known brands. Sound is ok we are replacing drum heads to remove some of the ring and "bong" noise pedal isn't very good but still completely functional very very easy to set up and tear down cymbals are on quality not the greatest sound but what you expect for the price. I expect these to last until the day my son out grows them he is only 2 so that will be years from now all and all I love them and so does he
customer_reviews.author: Momma O

customer_reviews.title: And is not what it looks like!! Picture show one thing and they send ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this item! Because if you want to return it they'll charge you $50 dollars!!! And is not what it looks like!! Picture show one thing and they send you another plus it says is for a 5 feet tall boy but is not!! Is super small my son is 4 years and maybe past 4 feet tall and looks like a toy!!! Have to get stuck with it because didn't wanna give 50 bucks for nothing!!!😡😡😠😠
customer_reviews.author: Kal Rhomni

customer_reviews.title: Loud and proud
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a 4 year old and I hope he gets a chance to use it. So far every adult that comes in contact with it needs to sit on the little stool and play the drums. Must say it's got decent sound and will only sound better as the folks that keep banging on it get better. Also drives a mother-in-law crazy when she's in town visiting. I make sure of that.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers favorite gift!
customer_reviews.text: My sons favorite gift!!! His reaction ended up getting him mentioned on the Kelly Clarkson show as well as going viral online! I have no quarrels about this set, when I purchased it was on backorder but it still came within a reasonable time. My fiancé who is a musician agrees that the sound is great for a beginner set and it is well worth the money. This was an upgrade from my sons music alley $50 set.
customer_reviews.author: Jauniyah

customer_reviews.title: Nice setup for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who was 12 at the time. She's under 5' and still uses her drums regularly. We did not have the room for an adult size set and this was the perfect option for us. She did bust her snare a few months in and the company allowed me to purchase another head for the snare, which was packaged nicely and they were very quick in responding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well my son loves them its just his size. Its a good value worth yhe money. Now assembling it lol the directions were horrible. For someone that knows/been around drums it be easy to assemble knowing the terminology for everything, but for someone like me that hasnt been around drums directions didnt make any sense. Lucky for me i can look at a picture and put it together. Maybe theys should label the bags with letters and instructions to make it easier for the non musicians puttting it together. Overall the drums work and sound great
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner drum kit for children
customer_reviews.text: It is a good beginner kit for a child that is small from 3 years of age all the way up till 10 years old I ended up changing all the heads on it because the heads that it comes with does not sound very good that is the only downfall to this drum kit so if you buy this drum kit probably will replace it with remo heads or Evans which ever those are the real drum heads and may be the symbols
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Future rock star???
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my granddaughter's 5th birthday. My wife plays drums and she loves getting on grandma's drums and playing. Getting her own small drum set was a no brainer. SHE LOVE'S THEM. Only catch... Our daughter insisted we keep the drums at our house. If I were to criticize one thing its' the symbols. Could have been a tad better quality. My wife is now going to start teaching our granddaughter how to play. You can never start too young. Future rock star???
customer_reviews.author: JoeJoe56

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set- excellent customer service from seller!
customer_reviews.text: I was upset to open the package and find that there were no directions but found them with a google search. I had one piece arrive damaged and the company replaced it promptly. I was very happy with this drum set and the customer service I received. I would say make sure you have all parts and some time to put together unless you are a pro! We did it Christmas Eve for a Christmas morning surprise and it took us longer than we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for a starter set. It loses one star because when the High hat gets banged too hard the screw loosens the cymbal completely. The little bench is a little flimsy. The kick drum pedal squeaks terribly, but unsure that could get fixed. This set is for my six year old and he is average height and it works great for him. I'm 5'3" 130 lbs and I can use it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TargetLover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drum kit for any young beginner. It's not a professional kit but it's definitely not a toy drum set. The set can be played hard and the drum heads can be tuned to the correct tone. I bought it for my 9 year old daughter and she loves it. This set has helped her learn the basics and understand what features she will be looking for in her next professional drum kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time buying things like this online without having seen it first hand. I was quite surprised by the quality of the drums. All the hardware is quite solid. Nothing about this kit seems cheep to me. My boy loves it, and will enjoy it for a while till I need to get him a larger one. Then my next younger boy will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J Stott

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old, it's great! He loves it. We've had it a month now and he's been beating and banging on it. It's durable. My 11 year old has enjoyed it as well. The only complaint I have is the legs on the one of the drums that sits on the floor just don't stay tightened down so it slips and has to be readjusted. It's kind of a pain, but it's still worth the money. My son wanted silver so that's what I ordered and it's beautiful. Very pleased and satisfied with the product and seller, shipping was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Sad this wasn't a sturdy kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson, he loved it! HOWEVER, the kick pedal for the drum gave up within the first 2 months--it's a fabric strip and very flimsy. Several other pieces have failed. I hope this review gets the attention of the seller. At least let me know if we can purchase replacement parts!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Correll

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner kids - double serves as a toy and learner set
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. We bought this for our kids 4 & 8 and they love playing it. Without being excessively expensive it works well both for fun and in the event that the child develops an interest. I gave 4 stars for setup - I have never worked with drums before and the instruction sheet was very small. It would have helped if they provided a larger color picture. I had to simultaneously use a you tube video for assembly of kids DERosa drum to help me with visualization of parts.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and play
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this drum set for one of our kids for Christmas. It was very easy to set up and is the perfect size for him. It has provided several hours of entertainment for the family (some with a headache to follow!). Overall, this was a perfect purchase, arriving on time in the condition expected! The set seems to hold up well to a 5 year old's hard hits and kicks! This will be around for a while!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.A

customer_reviews.title: Drums
customer_reviews.text: These drums were recommended for my four year old to begin learning how to play. They were easy to assemble. Came with everything including the sticks. The drums are not flimsy or look cheap. They are pretty sturdy and they sound great too. It was a perfect fit for my son.
customer_reviews.author: DVal

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my son, he loves to play on these. One of the bolts for the symbol were not in the package but I was able to find a cheap fix for it using a spare bolt I had laying around. The drumsticks this drum set came with are not the best quality, they started to fall apart and ended up giving my son a splinter in his hand. This is a very durable drum set though and I expect him to be able to use these for several more years.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Drums for a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter asked Santa for drums for Christmas. I purchased this after consulting with my SIL who is a musician. He was impressed with the construction and sound. We were going to mute it but, what the heck. We're masochists. Between the drums and the guitar the 4-year-old has we have a band. RHCP look out. 21 Pilots they are coming for you.
customer_reviews.author: Crzyoldone

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: As per other reviews, instruction sheet was a little unclear but managed to figure out via YouTube and Google. (Thank you internet!) My son's drum teacher came over to set it and said that it's a good beginner set. Good sound and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Leong

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with this product. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drum set for my sons 5th birthday. It fits him perfectly. I am a drummer as well and I’ll be honest, for the price I paid I did not expect to get a good quality set or such a decent sound. This set is AWESOME! It sounds remarkable for what it is and you can tell it’s well made. And after it took a beating from him, I played and they can really hold their weight. Seriously. If you want to buy your kid a drum set, this is the one. Strong work Mendini!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Spenceley

customer_reviews.title: One part was damaged and the instructions were terrible. Very cute drum set though.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give 5 stars, but the assembly process was challenging since the directions were far from helpful. Thank goodness for you tube. We ended up with an extra piece that was not mentioned. I hope it is ot vital since it is not on the drum set. I suggest some more detailrs instructions with color and pictures. Or perhaps a youtube video that goes step by step?? The snare drum came with a crack in the batter head. I have reached out to the company and hope they can send a replacement. I will edit my review based on the response I get. I am hopefull.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the parent who doesn't want to spend an arm and a leg to find out that their kid doesn't like playing the drums as much as he thought he would. The sound is good enough to not drive a parent insane while a 4 year old is getting the hang of it. But the parts feel kinda cheaply made. Definitely a good beginner set but not something you would want to play gigs with.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Mason

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set for beginners. This was a gift for my sons 3rd birthday. He loves them. The instructions work well to a certain point & then literally just stop. I don't know what that was about. We had to look up on YouTube the rest of the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Carla De Alba

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with this were not threaded all the way to the end!! We would have had a very disappointing Christmas morning if my FIL didnt happen to have a machine at his shop to fix this at 11pm on Christmas Eve. The directions just ended too when putting together one of the cymbals...leaving us to figure it out on our own.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for children wanting to start playing drums
customer_reviews.text: First don't let anyone fool you this drum kit is perfect for young kids just starting to play. I bought this for my five-year-old son as I did not want to spend over $500 for a music store drum kit. Took me approximately an hour to set this up on Christmas Eve. Instructions were easy to read it was packaged nicely and one box. The kick pedal is a little squeaky but with some WD-40 it fixed it just fine. Overall very satisfied with this drum kit would recommend it to anyone who's young kids want to start playing drums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A drum set is perhaps a parent's worst nightmare and we did it to ourselves
customer_reviews.text: This was the one think our son wanted for Christmas so we HAD to deliver. A drum set is perhaps a parent's worst nightmare and we did it to ourselves. This is a great set for the beginner. Assembly is a bit tricky as the instructions are not that great but we managed to fumble our way through it. It produces a nice, albeit loud sound and he's happy so it's well worth the noise. This set pairs nicely with earplugs and Excedrine.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Herder

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves his drums
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson and he was so excited. I play drums and he always wants to play when he comes over my house. When I set these up for him he was so excited because he can reach the pedals and sit on the throne by himself. It is pretty well constructed for the money. It included absolutely everything that you need to get started. I would recommend for a child beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent First Drum Set for the Musically Inclined
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drum set for a 3 year old. Perfect Size with really good durability. This is for a toddler who really likes to drum and is going to get a lot of use out of it. If it is just something for a kid to hit with a stick - I would lean toward cheaper options...but if your kid shows a bent towards rhythm and music, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids 4-10
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 7 year old twins. Just the right size, they will be able to play this for several years. Great quality for the price, this doesn't feel like a toy that is going to fall apart after 3 months. My kids are overjoyed. The instructions aren't great, but it is pretty easy to figure it all out. I think we had it all put together in about 30-40 minutes (with kids helping).
customer_reviews.author: sonoma chelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been meaning to write a review for this junior drum set. We purchased it as a Christmas gift for our two and a half year old nephew and couldn’t have been more pleased! The quality for the price was better than we even expected and it was the perfect size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Catt

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AFTER 10 months
customer_reviews.text: Good for a starter drum set for our 10-year-old. We didn’t want to spend a lot of money to find out that he doesn’t like to play the drums. It’s definitely not high-quality but it is not complete junk. Definitely, not the easiest thing to put together and instructions aren’t the best. Update: started falling apart after 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: James Rupe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drum set for my sons birthday.....the head on the snare drum was ripped. I contacted them and let them know about the issue, they replied within 24 hrs letting me know they would send out a new head. I recieved the new head about a week later. This is definately a good starter set......the instructions need revised a bit, but overall this a good product and customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Deason

customer_reviews.title: For tiny drummers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter, she absolutely loves it. It's the perfect size for a tiny person. The sound is fantastic. The quality and finish are amazing. They are loud, it's a REAL drum set, but what did you expect?
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: 6 yo LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a real drum set, not a toy. But it’s perfect for littles like my six year old. It’s not giant like an adult set and has enough drums to help him learn. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ajmarcott

customer_reviews.title: No Directions and No Help...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good set for a kid. Mine came broken, however, and Amazon refunded some of the cost of it. The worst part however is No Directions!!!! We had to stay up late on Christmas Eve and try to figure it out online on an ipad. They have minimal directions on their website, but even those are sparse and apply to a bunch of different versions of the set, so they were not too helpful. The set itself is ok for a junior. The Symbol doesnt really rattle/rotate much and a couple of the drum heads seem cheap, but so far it has held up well when my 5-6 year old beats on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S Kuzmickas

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our 13yr old son. It is not intimidating and small enough to make him feel comfortable to learn on. Really great set!!! Perfect for beginners and not too big!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me, Ms. G

customer_reviews.title: The pride and joy of our little rocker...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this drum set. He won't let anyone else even touch it; treats it like his baby. Santa found the assembly to be easy and quick, even the hi-hat, and the drum heads stretched and tuned beautifully and with ease. My advice would be to keep the drum key in a safe place; no other drummers in our family, so if it gets lost, nobody has one handy on a keychain...like a church key, and there is crying and screaming until we can locate a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Black

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters love them.
customer_reviews.text: We are a year and a half in with these drums, and they have held up to two kids pretty well. The only issue, after about 6 months, was that the strap on the foot pedal ripped. We tried getting it repaired at four different music stores, but they could not get the part. In the end, my husband mad a replacement with some strapping.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Drums
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of drums!!! My 9 year really likes them. The only negative is the assembly instructions were not very helpful, we went on You Tube to get clearer instructions!!!
customer_reviews.author: debi

customer_reviews.title: Not for real drummers
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our 9 year old son. He had received a 3 piece starter set a few years earlier and this was supposed to be his upgrade. It is cheaply made and doesn't stay together. I have to tighten pieces everyday before he can practice. It does not hold up to regular use for practicing. The ride cymbal is trashed because everytime he hits it it leaves a huge dent. We are not impressed and had we realized these issues sooner we would have returned it. Now we have to try to sell it...
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together(45min), and good quality for what it is. Perfect for my five year old. All pieces were there and yeah the instructions were brief so I could see how someone who wasn't musically inclined would have an issue. But not the case here and I would say it's definitely a step up from a junky toy. Glad I picked this one for a starter kit for my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Laural

customer_reviews.title: Good size and value
customer_reviews.text: Pro's-- all my kids have enjoyed playing with it, from my 11yo down to 5yo. Good size, I play a little myself. Cons-- directions could be better, some parts were hard to figure out where to put. Got it eventually!
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great purchase! My son is 7 years old and a little over 4ft tall. This is the perfect size for him. The quality is great and everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie oswald

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: it states that this is for jouniors up to 12 and 5ft tall, i would say do not buy unless your child is under 7years of age, easy to set up, and very good quality, but not suitable for a 9 year old, way to small, i should of sent back and ordered an adult one, but to close to christmas, so hopefully he can bang the drums alittle and will sell on line and order a bigger one, very disappointed thanks
customer_reviews.author: jan, farnham

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s face it, this isn’t a DW kit but for kids this is great. Tuned up it sounds pretty good all things considered. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Alba

customer_reviews.title: Directions are crap!
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about drums but expected this 5 piece kids set to be fairly simple to put together. If you are uneducated in drums these directions are awful, crap! Would not recommend putting together by yourself without a knowledgeable person in drums, unless you have hours and a lot of patience. Took waaaayyyy too long and YouTube to help. Very frustrating!!! Needs to be re-written. Getting it put together was a nightmare. But good cheaper set for kids and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but customer support?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my almost 4 year old this past Christmas. It’s a great kit that was easy to assemble. My only issue I had is that one of the kick drum tension rods seemed like it was damaged at the end and wouldn’t screw in. I contacted customer support through Cecilio Music’s website on December 23rd about getting a replacement one but haven’t heard back. Maybe they will see this review and I will edit this to 5 stars once I hear back about a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: I took off another star because the cymbals are super flimsy and will eventually need to be replaced soon
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife purchased this set for our 4 year old son. I took off a star because it did not come with the instructions to put it together.I had to search for the instructions online. I took off another star because the cymbals are super flimsy and will eventually need to be replaced soon. Other than that, our son loves this set and it will bring him joy for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: ergibson83

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drum set
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took me a out 90 minutes but pretty intuitive even for a novice like myself. My 5 year old adores these drums. We started with a $40 toy set that just wouldn’t die. These are a legitimate drum set and are sturdy and sound great. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: My godchildren enjoy playing on them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my godchildren/grandchildren. They seem to really enjoy it. I have not had the chance to hear them with it, but their grandmother has sent me pix of them playing with them. She suggested it to me as a birthday present for the little boy, but the little girl plays on them, too.
customer_reviews.author: William Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome youth starter set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old for Christmas. He loves it, and so do I. "Santa" played around with it before the big day, and I have to say I was surprised with the quality given the price. While the skins to seem somewhat cheep, that's to be expected. But the hardware is solid and steady. The directions were a little short on details, but it still went together pretty easy. I think this is a great set for the young beginner. Note that this is a youth sized set. My 12 year old is a little big for it (not to mention "Santa").
customer_reviews.author: Bluehat

customer_reviews.title: Kids drum set rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My son is cery tall for a 3 yr old and needed reach. This is just what you would want as a kids drum set. Quality sounds and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and product for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a good price. I bought that set for my 10 year old daughter. She does enjoy it and the sound is good enough for a kid like her. except the carrier info that wasn't clear enough (Finally delivered by Canada Post), everything was great.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: 5-Piece Complete Junior Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my grandson and he just loves it. He thinks he's goona be the next John Bonham :)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My son liked it eventhough...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this drum set for my 10 year old son for Christmas. He was so excited for it to arrive. I was surprised it was delivered in one box. The bass drum has this crack as seen in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Penny J

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy something a little more sturdy. At this point its in the corner of ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set and got it together but its been nothing but a disaster. The metal pieces that twist on are always coming loose, the cymbal​ wouldn't stay up from day 1, the seat is flimsy and falls off. Its a glorified drum set from Toys R Us. Go ahead and buy something a little more sturdy. At this point its in the corner of the room and the kids just sit on the floor and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Haas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The drum sets is good for kids to play around with. The drumsticks broke the 1st week we had it. But I think it was my nephew fault that he bangs on it pretty hard.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: update...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My boys have been banging away all day and nothing has broke thus far. For the price and the two day shipping, I would definitely recommend especially if you're unsure if the child will stick with wanting to play the drums. Will update to let you know how it holds up. UPDATE Product did not hold up well. Several pieces fell off,and frequently things started to become loose. If you are looking for something more realistic than a toy, this is for you. If you are looking for a good drum set than skip this.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like trash and the quality is low
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like trash and the quality is low... PERFECT for the price and for my 3-year-old. Upgradable heads and hardware. Feeding my child prodigy's obsession perfectly to drum night and day.
customer_reviews.author: paulthebrown

customer_reviews.title: This was supposedly in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: Be leary of buying warehouse deals. This was supposedly in like new condition. It was far from it. The base drum frame was cracked and chewed up. Missing numerous parts. The drumset I'm sure is fine, however I am putting it together to place under the Christmas tree and have found that I do not have all the pieces. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The 1st day my son was playing with it The drum set got dents It really didn’t last long but I knew it wasn’t I just didn’t think it would be the 1st day
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: It came as expected and the quality is very good. was fairly easy to put together and sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: My son saved his Christmas money to purchase this drum set. It came as expected and the quality is very good. was fairly easy to put together and sounds good. ( Well for an 11 year old who has never played before. lol ) you'll want someone to help tune them and I recommend a pillow in the bass drum
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for a three year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my grandson, to keep him from playing mine. The only issue I have with set is the snare drum is not an actual snare drum.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners setup
customer_reviews.text: If your kids is interested in playing the drums then this beginners set is perfect. It was fairly easy to assemble and the quality is great. My Son loves them. Just make sure to buy some earplugs for when your Son or daughter is practicing...LOL These are great though and I definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Bickel

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Well, Im not a drummer myself, but if I could veer my 3 year old daughter in that genre I'd like to try. So I got it Christmas 2011 and she loved it! Only problem would be the snare doesn't come the snare ball things to give it that real snare sound, and the snare prop doesnt tilt towards the drummer, so my daughter being 3 years old its a little difficult to play having to reach that high. Other then that, there is some flimsy components, but nothing that a kid 5 or under would tear up easily. My daughter is happy with it, and that's all that matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: VS Crystals & More

customer_reviews.title: It's Small but Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 10 year old son and it's almost too small for him but he still plays it and loves it. It was a great starter set. Set up took about an hour. I watched a youtube vid to help. It is a great set for a young child that's interested in playing drums. Quality is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible - breaks instantly
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Broke after a few weeks. Really cheap. Cymbal split, snare and other heads broke. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Your Amazon friend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 5 year old. Quality product for the price, but the cymbal comes loose every time it's used and is too difficult for my child to adjust himself.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: really great
customer_reviews.text: great drums for christmas present for my 8 yr old grandson ... came quickly...well built .
customer_reviews.author: barbara halk

customer_reviews.title: Legit and solid shells and hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little set for my grandson! Legit and solid shells and hardware. Cymbals are a little lack luster, but at this price, you can’t expect Zildjians! This set is perfect for your little drummer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ireson

customer_reviews.title: Decent for practice
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old wanted to start taking drum lessons again and we wanted to find a cheap set for him to practice on. It definitely sounds like a cheap kids set but it seems sturdy and for the money it's a good value and will last until he's ready for a real set.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, looks good, adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 3 year old toddler. Really good sound, looks great and can obviously be adjusted as the child ages
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a very nice drum set for up to age 7. Maybe my son is just a little bit big, but I don't think he'll have this for a full year. He loves it and I'm happy about that but he said, "mom, I asked Santa for a bigger one". I just didn't want to go all out on a big set when he has never played the drums. The only other problem I had is that the screw to hold the drum didn't screw in properly, so we'll have to get the right ones from a hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Jay

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece. I hear she loves it. That’s the only input I have.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Osorio Selander

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Junior Set
customer_reviews.text: This Mending Junior Drum Set is fantastic. I bought this set for my 2 & 3 year olds to bang on as they love playing everyone else drums. The quality of this set is great. My kids have been banging on this since the day I put it together and they have yet to damage anything. My wife and I have even started playing on them to show the kids how. I have never personally owned a drum set but I have played enough to say this set is a very good entry level junior set.
customer_reviews.author: AQucsaiJr

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic gift, made well, seems solid and sounds pretty good. Great for starters!
customer_reviews.author: Posi

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our 17 month old grandson for Christmas. He’s been beating on my husbands drums since he was 9 months old so we got him his own drum kit! It’s perfect for his age and he plays on them every day. Totally into it and so glad we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: and probably recommended at a local music shop
customer_reviews.text: This has not held up well to our 6 year old's occasional use. Price was low for a "wow" present, but the hardware is cheap and some of of the stands have fallen apart with very little use. I have a hard time seeing a kid who is serious about his drums getting much out of this. If I had to buy another drum set for Christmas, I'd buy something simpler until you know the child is going to actually take lessons. Then I'd buy a serious set that is well made, and probably recommended at a local music shop.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Little drummer boy
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Easy to assemble. Sturdy and outside of the extra noise... lol they are Great... got these for my 4 year old and he is on his way to being a star...
customer_reviews.author: Marquetta Rattler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 2 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old LOVES this set. He is still too short to sit on the seat and coordinate play but he will sit there and stomp the bass or high hat pedals then will stand up and play away. It sounds good too. I'd never heard a child's set and didn't expect realism but you can definitely tell what he is hitting--rooms away. And it is holding up to a 2 yr old just fine. Love this set.
customer_reviews.author: cmaks

customer_reviews.title: REALLY Great Toddler Set
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE AND DECENT SOUNDING TOMS! Snare's a little lame, cymbals can be changed to your liking. But really this is a great starter set my TWO YEAR OLD fits nicely behind it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leone

customer_reviews.title: Everything came as advertised in excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his drum set. Everything came as advertised in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Jean Desir

customer_reviews.title: Warning! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Drums are a few months old and already falling apart. I bought two sets and one is okay so maybe I got a lemon? There is no customer service and no way to contact amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greta

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using them for over a year, they are great, still in great condition. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: grasiela banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken piece. Bought this for Christmas for my 5 yr old son. Imagine his frustration when the gift Santa brought was broken. Called Mendini and they promised to send a new screw in 5 business days, which is like a year for a toddler. Extremely frustrating experience so far!
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Toddler sized
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty good and it looks professional. The size is great for a toddler. I needed it to be larger for a tall 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: PKB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 for quality but my 8 year old is driving me insane with the loud bangs. My other child who is 12 is about 5'4, can also play comfortably on it. This didn't take up too much space either.
customer_reviews.author: mirm24

customer_reviews.title: Look Like Picture
customer_reviews.text: The Legs Move So Much You Have To Keep Tighting Them Up Son Didn’t Like That To Much Other Than That It Look Like Picture
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Happy 5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Quality!! My 5 year old son received these from Santa and is in love!!! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

product_meta.title: Mendini by Cecilio 16 inch 5-Piece Complete Kids/Junior Drum Set with Adjustable Throne, Cymbal, Pedal & Drumsticks, Metallic Black, MJDS-5-BK
product_meta.description: Color:Black MetallicThis Mendini by Cecilia 5-piece Junior Drum Set with cymbals is an "all-in-one" Fully functional drum set designed specifically for entry level drummers. This set has everything you need to get set up and playing in no time. It is a perfect gift for the young drummer who wants the most realistic experience but may be too small for a full size drum set. Buy with confidence as it comes with a 1 year against any manufacturer's defects.
feature_bullets: Recommended Age Group: Child, Kids 2.5 ft to 5 ft tall
16" x 11" Bass Drum, 10" x 5" and 8" x 6" Tom Toms
12" x 10" Floor Tom, 10" x 6" Matching Snare Drum
8" Hi-Hat, 10" Crash Cymbal with Bass Drum Mounted Stand
Includes: Round padded height adjustable drum throne, Bass drum pedal, A pair of wooden drum sticks, Easy to read set up instructions (Assembly is required)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,377 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
